alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 7:36PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern St. Johns, northeastern Putnam and southeastern Clay Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 736 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bostwick, or 8 miles north of Palatka, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph, pea size hail, and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Hastings, Saint Augustine Beach, Vilano Beach, Bostwick, Federal Point, Saint Augustine Shores, Butler Beach, Saint Augustine South and Spuds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam
